title: similar to Franklin Gothic...but not quite
content:
The ends of the S are not like Franklin Gothic Heavy Italic, but the G is close. Any Suggestions?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130210003009im_/http:/typophile.com/files/slinglogo_redblack%20copy_5200.jpg)
author: gillo

comments.content: Helvetica Black Italic, to be exact.
ha ha! i knew it was something obvious...i don't have helvetica on my work computer, and am not experienced enough to pick it out without comparing...Face is now bright red...
Thank you, by the way, for the very quick and precise response. Most Helpful!
